body: In the process of iterating on https://github.com/spack/spack/pull/24274 , version 1.17 of DD4hep was renamed from "01-17-00" to "01-17", in line with the naming conventions of previous releases. Since release archives contain a subdirectory with the version string in it, this changes the contents of the tarball ever so slightly, so the SHA-256 checksum must change as well.
title: [dd4hep] Fix hash for version 01-17
